attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to reconsider opening the Barry Cemetary in the Vale of Glamorgan to enable people to visit lost loved ones,.
attributes.background: My mum passed away just over 4 years ago, I have struggled with mental health ever since, this year I missed her birthday which broke my heart.

rejection.details:
Responsibility for the opening of specific cemeteries and other burial sites lies with local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

In any event, since you started your petition, Barry Town Council has re-opened Barry Cemetery: http://www.barrytowncouncil.gov.uk/news.php?Action=News.
